thread.title: Linda Robins
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by Linda Robins

author: Linda Robins
title: Linda Robins
text: I needed this product quickly (a folding commode) for an upcoming surgery. Easy Comforts' Customer Service did an amazing job expediting this order. Their kind actions were very appreciated. I got the product in time and the quality of it was even better than expected. Thank you!!
